attributes.additional_details: I BELIEVE THE GOVERNMENT SHOULD TAKE THE UK OUT OF THE EUROPEAN UNION.THIS WOULD ALLOW US TO CONTROL OUR OWN BORDERS AND MAKE OUR OWN LAWS (INCLUDING THE ABILITY TO REINTRODUCE THE DEATH PENALTY)WITHOUT INTERFERENCE FROM UNELECTED OFFICIALS. THERE IS NO BENEFIT TO BEING IN THE EU. ORIGINALLY IT WAS INTENDED AS A COMMON MARKET BUT NON MEMBERS NORWAY AND SWITZERLAND STILL TRADE WITH EUROPE.
